July 26, 1873 D Morley Contest
Morley Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
morley-contest
None
Morley, Leeds, West Yorkshire, England, UK See http://www.ibew.org.uk/misc4287.htm
Band Contest - Morley A brass band contest was held at Morley in the Nelson Cricket field and was concluded by a gala and athletic sports. The prizes for the contest were awarded as follows: 1. Linthwaite Band, £20; 2. Meltham Mills, £12; 3, Dewsbury Old Band, £7; 4, Berry Brow, £4; 5. Birstal Band, £2. These were all the bands that had been entered for the contest. For the cornet solo there were four entries, and two prizes, viz: 1, C. Auty, Linthwaite, £2; 2, Jas. Pickard, Dewsbury, 10s. There was also a trombone contest, for which there were five entries. The prizes were: 1, W. Lee, Dewsbury £2; 2, Geo. Sykes, Dewsbury, 10s. The judge was M. Jas. Hartman, of the 12th Lancers. The weather was fine, and the entertainment and sports were well attended.
Nov. 11, 2011, 2:16 p.m. Nov. 29, 2013, 10:59 p.m.
1 Linthwaite Silver Band Edwin Swift Tannhäuser [arr. Swift]
2 Meltham and Meltham Mills Band John Gladney Jnr Lucia di Lammermoor [unknown arranger]
3 Dewsbury Old Band John Brook Reminiscences of Verdi
4 Berry Brow John Brook Lucia di Lammermoor [unknown arranger]
5 Birstall Old John Brook Hallelujah Chorus [unknown arranger]
